claims: Peregrine falcon can reach over 240 mph while diving

Peregrine falcon can reach over 240 mph: Peregrine falcon diving speed Fastest speed of peregrine falcon
As swift as a speeding arrow and more rapid than a cheetah, the peregrine falcon is the fastest member of the animal kingdom, with a diving speed of more than 200 miles per hour.
Peregrine falcon diving speed Fastest speed of peregrine falcon

As of 2018, the fastest recorded falcon was at 242 mph (nearly 390 km/h). Researchers at the University of Groningen in the Netherlands and at Oxford University used 3D computer simulations in 2018 to show that the high speed allows peregrines to gain better maneuverability and precision in strikes.
